Html:
I am looking for a tool to convert web pages into Word documents with styles that correspond with the html styles. Is that what this project will do?

I downloaded the files and put them on my web server but when I tried to look at the example I got this error message: Parse error: parse error in D:\www\resourcecentre.org.uk\WWW\example.php on line 29 and a similar one when I wanted to look at the documentation. What have I done wrong?
What version of PHP are you using? This converter requires PHP 5.2 or later.

I don't know. I think we are probably not using php now (which is why it doesn't work - thank you) but we will be in our new website. I will talk to the web developers to see if this is something we can use.
